title: quarkus gradle build fails when buildscript contains a listener for added tasks
body:
### Describe the bug

Trying to run a barebones quarkus gradle project fails if the build script contains  (`tasks.whenTaskAdded`). The error message relates to the io.quarkus plugin.

```
An exception occurred applying plugin request [id: 'io.quarkus', version: '3.1.2.Final']
> Failed to apply plugin 'io.quarkus'.
   > SourceSet with name 'quarkus-generated-sources' not found.
```

### How to Reproduce?

```
quarkus create app --gradle
cd code-with-quarkus/
echo -e 'buildscript { tasks.whenTaskAdded { theTask -> println "task ${theTask} added" } }' | cat - build.gradle > build.gradle_new
mv build.gradle_new build.gradle
./gradlew build
```
